text: Zemia Rodnô is the national anthem of the Kaszub region. It is used by the people of Kaszubia and is sung in the Kaszubian language. This is not the official anthem but is often regarded as the anthem. It is used in Kaszub culture, located in northern Poland. It is important to know that this is not the anthem of Pomerania. Its author was Jan Trepczyk, who wrote the song in 1954. It is still used today in the Kaszubian Territories. Category:National anthems Category:Kashubia
title: Zemia Rodnô
